name: LyondellBasell Industries N.V.
bossPosition: Sr Vice President, Olefins & Polyolefins Europe, Asia & International
goal:
LyondellBasell is one of the world's largest plastics, chemical and refining companies and a member of the S&P 500. We participate in the entire petrochemical value chain, from refining to specialized petrochemical product end uses.

LyondellBasell products and technologies are used to make items that improve the quality of life for people around the world including packaging, electronics, automotive parts, home furnishings, construction materials and biofuels. Additionally, LyondellBasell is a leading provider of technology licenses and a supplier of catalysts for polyolefin production.

LyondellBasell is listed on the New York Stock Exchange.

Key company facts (2016):

• 13.000 employees worldwide
• 55 manufacturing sites in 18 countries
• Annual revenues of $29,2 billions
• Listed in the S&P 500 Index

In Europe, LyondellBasell operates 17 sites in 6 countries, employing around 6.000 people. Our locations include:

• France: plants in Berre and Fos-sur-Mer
• Germany: technology centre in Frankfurt, plants in Bayreuth, Frankfurt, Ludwigshafen, Münchsmünster and Wesseling
• Italy: technology centre in Ferrara, plants in Brindisi and Ferrara
• Netherlands: administrative office/headquarters in Rotterdam, plants in Botlek, Maasvlakte and Moerdijk
• Spain: plant in Tarragona
• United Kingdom: administrative office/headquarters in London, plants in Carrington and Milton Keynes
